ðŸ“– Summary: Ito is an intelligent voice assistant that provides seamless voice dictation across any application. It features real-time transcription, customizable shortcuts, and smart adaptation through custom dictionaries and usage pattern learning. Ito also offers data management features like note-saving, interaction history, and cloud syncing.
